mapper.select: select orderno, email, username, folder, thumbnail, original, filename, price, createdt, charged, expiredt from "order" where orderno = #{orderno} and email = #{email} and charged = #{charged}

select orderno, email, username, folder, thumbnail, original, price, createdt, charged, expiredt from "order" where orderno = #{orderno} and email = #{email} and charged = true and expiredt >= #{expiredt} order by createdt asc

select username, folder, thumbnail, price, count(1) as qty from "order" where username = #{username} and folder = #{folder} and charged = true group by username, folder, thumbnail, price order by qty desc
mapper.insert: insert into "order" (orderno, email, username, folder, thumbnail, original, filename, price, createdt, charged, expiredt) values (#{orderno}, #{email}, #{username}, #{folder}, #{thumbnail}, #{original}, #{filename}, #{price}, #{createdt}, #{charged}, #{expiredt})
mapper.update: update "order" set charged = true, expiredt = #{expiredt} where orderno = #{orderno} and email = #{email} and charged = false
mapper.delete: delete from "order" where orderno = #{orderno} and charged = false
